page.title: 18RELIGION _ BORTH
page.content: {St. Matthew's Church}, (C in W) Services were held at the old Church School until the Church was built in 1875 on a rocky outcrop in the bog. Services are held every Sunday. {Gerlan}(Presbyterian) Libanus and Soar chapels amalgamated in 1968. Libanus became known as the Gerlan (Welsh for seashore). English or Welsh services are held every Sunday. {Wesley }(Siloh _ Methodist) The chapel was sold but the vestry was kept and Welsh services held except when the Christian Sea Side Mission hold English services in July and August. {Morfa}(Welsh for sea marsh_ Unitarian) Services are held every Sunday. {Catholic Church of Our Lady Star of {the Sea }(The former Soar Chapel) English services held every Sunday.
